The Elder who Gave a Flower Seat
â€œThe One with Golden Skin, the Awakened One,ğŸ”½Shining like the sun,
I was going not far away
from Siddhattha, the Unconquered One.
After going out to meet him,
and bringing him into the hermitage,
I gave a flower seat
with a mind full of confidence.
After raising my hands in respectful salutation,
I was filled with joy at that time.
After resolving my mind on the Buddha,
I dedicated that deed.
Whatever merit I had made
to the One who is Self-Blighted,
by all that wholesome deed
I became pure in the Dispensation.
For ninety-four aeons
I gave a flower seat at that time;
I do not know of a bad destination,
this is the result of the flower seat.
